sources.title: 'Roulette' - film
sources.description: You thought luck was random? 'Roulette' tells the story of Jake, a student who finds out his luck is a lot more predictable than everyone else's. The film follows him as he discovers his 'condition', which he must learn to master or live in fear for the rest of his life. Scott Tanner returns with his fifth film, 'Roulette', due January 2010. Starring Andrew James, Andy Cruickshank, Jo Tivey and Steve Morris. Copyright Â© Scott Tanner 2010
